title: BRIEF-Nzuri Copper Says Takeover Scheme Of Co Proposed To Be Implemented In Early November
text:
BRIEF-Nzuri Copper Says Takeover Scheme Of Co Proposed To Be Implemented In Early November

Stock Markets 20 minutes ago (Sep 30, 2019 16:20)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Nzuri Copper Says Takeover Scheme Of Co Proposed To Be Implemented In Early November Sept 30 (Reuters) - Nzuri Ltd : * PROPOSED SCHEME FOR ALL ISSUED CAPITAL IN NZURI TO BE ACQUIRED BY XUCHEN INTERNATIONAL LTD PROPOSED TO BE IMPLEMENTED IN EARLY NOVEMBER
